text: Church services can’t resume until we’re all vaccinated, says Bill Gates.
Bill Gates says you don't have a choice to be vaccinated or not.

A post shared on Facebook claims Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates said, Only those with all the required vaccinations may travel, visit churches, participate in sports, and music events, get a job, etc.
Bill Gates tweeted that vaccines in our food supply solves the problem of vaccine hesitancy.
entity_strings: Bill Gates, food supply, vaccine hesitancy

text: Bill Gates has called for the withdrawal of all Covid-19 vaccines.
Old newspaper shows Bill Gates suggest using vaccines to depopulate
